Html:
Hi, firstly let me say thanks for creating and enhancing a great tool!

I have a couple of points for review that I first noticed in b15 and are still there in b16:

1)  The Greaves of Malorne are shown as by far and away the best Cat DPS leggings, beating many items with far better basic stats.  Is this a bug, or am I missing something?

2)  It would be great to include the +2 threat enchant on gloves.

Many thanks..and keep up the great work :)
Hmmm...the 2t4 +20 energy chance maybe?  Surely it's not worth that much DPS increase?
The 2-piece T4 is worth almost 90 DPS in my gear. Yes, the DPS increase is that big (and scales with better gear).

Yes, 2T4 is huge, and should be used until after you've been farming Kil'Jaeden for a while.

2% threat too gloves is not a good enchant for ferals. For comparison, it's quite easy to tell the value of it; just find 2% of your total TPS.

Both; thanks for such a swift response and comprehensive too.  I'll surely be keeping 2t4 for cat at least for some time to come...

yeah..I have +15agi on my gloves atm, but continue to have real difficulty remaining at the top of all the mobs threat list when tanking 3 or more mobs.  It was that problem that prompted me to ask the question.  I realise that this is not the place to discuss aggro retention issues - and also suspect that it's more to do with my gameplay than anything else..just wanted to note why I had asked the Q; that's all :)

Yeah, pretty much any time any feral has asked about 2% Threat, it's because they're not using their skills as well as they could. Additionally, if you're gemming all stam, that also hurts your TPS too. Against 3 mobs, you want to to Mangle every time it's up, and fit 3 swipes in between each mangle. Same thing against 2 mobs. Against 1, you want to Lacerate instead of Swipe, unless your Swipes do more TPS than Lacerate (that happens when you get 4T6, or a bit later depending upon gemming).
